overview: From 2026-02-10 to 2026-02-11, elizaos-plugins/plugin-n8n-workflow had 1 new PRs (2 merged), 0 new issues, and 3 active contributors.

topPRs.title: feat: add modify existing workflow action and output schema validation
topPRs.author: standujar
topPRs.body:
## Summary

- **MODIFY_EXISTING_N8N_WORKFLOW action**: Load deployed workflows for editing, then use CREATE_N8N_WORKFLOW to make changes and redeploy
- **Output schema validation**: Validate that `$json.field` expressions reference fields that exist in upstream node output schemas
- **Auto-correction**: Invalid field references are automatically corrected using LLM with minimal context
- **Explicit intent support**: Multi-step agents can pass `intent` and `modification` via `_options` to bypass LLM classification
- **Parameter diff in preview**: After modification, the preview shows what parameters changed (fixes agent looping issue)
- **Preserve workflow ID**: When modifying existing workflows, the ID is preserved so deploy calls UPDATE instead of CREATE

## Changes

### New files
- `src/actions/modifyExistingWorkflow.ts` - New action to load existing workflows
- `src/utils/outputSchema.ts` - Schema validation utilities
- `src/prompts/fieldCorrection.ts` - Prompt for LLM auto-correction
- `scripts/crawl-schemas.ts` - Extract output schemas from n8n-nodes-base
- `__tests__/unit/outputSchema.test.ts` - Schema validation tests

### Modified files
- `src/actions/createWorkflow.ts` - Explicit intent support, parameter diff in preview
- `src/utils/generation.ts` - Preserve workflow ID, auto-correction function
- `src/utils/workflow.ts` - Output reference validation
- `src/services/n8n-workflow-service.ts` - Integration availability check, schema validation

## Test plan

- [x] All 198 tests pass
- [x] Build compiles without errors
- [x] Manual test: modify existing workflow updates instead of creates
- [x] Manual test: parameter diff shows in preview after modification

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **New Features**
  * Load and modify existing deployed workflows with per-user drafts (30â€‘minute TTL).
  * Explicit intent parameters to bypass AI classification (confirm, cancel, modify, new).
  * Automatic detection and correction of invalid field references.
  * Previews now show tracked parameter changes when workflows are modified.

* **Improvements**
  * Support updating workflows in place (create vs update flow).
  * Credential names now include contextual tags for clearer identification.
<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
